t: CDN Publishing Acquires Whitman from Anderson Press - Numismatic News
s: November 2, 2023 - CDN Publishing, LLC, the numismatic data company that publishes the wholesale-pricing Greysheet and other resources, has acquired book publisher Whitman Publishing. Included in the acquisition are Whitman brands, including H.E. Harris & Co.
